vision.notes: Sensory capabilities are unknown, but given the relationship to Rheidae, vision is likely present. No specific data is available about the visual capabilities of Opisthodactylidae.

audition.notes: Auditory capabilities are unknown. Given that it is a bird, hearing is likely present.

olfaction.notes: Olfactory capabilities are unknown. No information available.

somatosensation.notes: Somatosensory capabilities are unknown. Tactile sensation is likely present.
